decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing cards like Mystic Forge, Paradox Engine, and Basalt Monolith to generate infinite mana and card advantage to cast powerful spells like Karn, the Great Creator and The One Ring. The deck utilizes artifacts like Mox Opal and Mana Key to ramp up quickly and control the board with cards like Defense Grid. The goal is to assemble the combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with a powerful board state and game-ending threats.

The main theme of this deck is to control the game using a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage. The deck focuses on resource management and using cards like Brainstorm, Ponder, and Force of Will to manipulate the top of the deck and control the tempo of the game. It also includes powerful threats like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and Terminus to deal with opposing threats. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion provides additional value and a way to reset the board state if needed.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive Goblin tribal strategy. By utilizing powerful Goblins like Muxus, Goblin Grandee and Goblin Rabblemaster, along with cards like Chrome Mox and Simian Spirit Guide for fast mana acceleration, the deck aims to quickly build a board presence and deal damage to the opponent before they can set up their own strategy. Cards like Chalice of the Void and Cavern of Souls help protect the Goblins and disrupt the opponent's game plan, while Shatterskull Smashing and Broadside Bombardiers provide additional removal and reach.

The deck focuses on quickly assembling the Dark Depths combo using cards like Sylvan Library, Once Upon a Time, and Green Sun's Zenith to find key pieces. Crop Rotation and Mox Diamond help accelerate the process, while Knight of the Reliquary and Elvish Reclaimer can tutor for necessary lands. The deck also includes protection with cards like Swords to Plowshares, Sylvan Safekeeper, and Ramunap Excavator. With solid land choices and mana ramp, the goal is to create a 20/20 Marit Lage token as quickly as possible to overwhelm the opponent.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty, Atraxa, Grand Unifier, and Troll of Khazad-dûm, then bring them back to the battlefield using cards like Reanimate, Animate Dead, and Grief. The deck also utilizes disruption spells like Force of Will and Daze to protect the combo. The key strategy is to efficiently reanimate big threats while controlling the game with counter magic and disruptive creatures, ultimately overwhelming the opponent with powerful threats.

This Dimir Aggro Legacy deck focuses on aggressive creature plays, disruption, and graveyard interaction. By utilizing cards like Grief, Reanimate, and Murktide Regent, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent while also disrupting their game plan with cards like Force of Will and Daze. The deck also includes removal spells such as Fatal Push and Snuff Out to handle threats on the board. With a mix of efficient spells and creatures, this deck aims to win the game as quickly as possible while keeping the opponent on the back foot.

This BUG Control Legacy deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while efficiently deploying threats like Murktide Regent. It includes a mix of countermagic, removal, and card advantage to control the board and grind out advantage. The deck utilizes a variety of tools such as Force of Will, Brainstorm, and Wasteland to interact with the opponent and protect its own threats. With a focus on controlling the game and out-valuing the opponent, this deck aims to outlast and outmaneuver the opposition to secure victory.
